articles.title: Li Jinglei: Wang Leehom tried barging into family home with male strangers, By2 never sent over police investigation details - AsiaOne
articles.description: The recent 'whitewashing' of Wang Leehom's alleged misdeeds turned the tide against his ex-wife Li Jinglei, who received backlash and scathing comments online. Even so, the 35-year-old kept her peace for three weeks, until last night (Jan 11) when she posted …

articles.title: Face shields, plexiglass barriers 'a waste of money' in Covid-19 battle: US aerosol expert - The Star Online
articles.description: MANILA (Philippine Daily Inquirer/Asia News Network): Instead of face shields and plexiglass barriers, the Philippines should rely more on protective masks and proper ventilation, and even going outdoors, an American aerosol expert said.

articles.title: I didn't dare let my classmates know mum is a celebrity, says Chen Xiuhuan's daughter Shanisse - AsiaOne
